CustomField.description: used for Senior Care Provider Feedback Survey
CustomField.label: Provider Utilization Reasons

value.fullName: My loved one does not have care needs at this time.
value.label: My loved one does not have care needs at this time.

value.fullName: My loved one’s care needs have changed.
value.label: My loved one’s care needs have changed.

value.fullName: My loved one was not ready to initiate care, though they do have care needs.
value.label: My loved one was not ready to initiate care, though they do have care needs.

value.fullName: My loved one is not willing to accept care from any formal resources.
value.label: My loved one is not willing to accept care from any formal resources.

value.fullName: I was not satisfied with the provider options given.
value.label: I was not satisfied with the provider options given.
